caller_intent: Gary Smith wants to update his homeowner's insurance policy due to a change in mortgage servicer (from Movement Mortgage to Lakeview Loan Servicing) and needs assistance with the process.
resolution_steps: Agent explains need to provide the letter from Lakeview Loan Servicing to update the policy.
Agent suggests emailing the letter or taking a clear photo of it for texting.
Agent offers to send a message to the store to prepare a copy of the letter when Gary arrives in 30 minutes.
knowledge_required: Process for updating policies with mortgage servicer changes
summary: Gary Smith contacted Alliance Insurance to update his homeowner's insurance policy after his mortgage servicer changed. The agent guided him to submit a letter via text or in-person, coordinating with the store to prepare documents upon his arrival. The call concluded with Gary planning to visit the store in 30 minutes.
